translations: 贪婪地吃；生小猪（pig 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: adv. 永无可能；决不可能
狼吞虎咽地大吃；大吃特吃
[俚语]向睡着的人泼冷水(把他弄醒)
[食人生番用语](人肉宴席上的)人肉
◎暴发户；一步登天的人；行为粗鲁的有钱人

sentences.sentence: Some are so accustomed to pigging out, they can't cut back.
sentences.translation: 有些人习惯暴饮暴食了，他们不可能缩减食量。

sentences.sentence: Pigging and caliper the construction process of the same.
sentences.translation: 清管和测径的施工过程完全相同。

sentences.sentence: Complex pipe can be established by the method of back pressure pigging, caliper.
sentences.translation: 复杂的管道可采用建立背压的方法进行清管、测径。
